answers.answer: Could me many things.....  I would go to a doctor.  It could be diabetes, low blood sugar, anxiety, blood pressure issue.  A doc would be best to check you out.
I agree; it very well could be an anxiety disorder, but a doctor should rule out other possibilities first.

question: I've had this problem for awhile now and I don't know what to do about it. I get dizzy, its hard to breath, I start shaking, and I get confused. These problems happen everyday and more than five times a day. They last between eleven and twenty minutes.
title: Do I have an anxiety disorder?
